One day, our Yori ends up modeling for a fashion show…  \n  \n2.The Love Affairs at the Somagi's  \nUmino Kujira answers an ad for a live-in housekeeper at the home of two brothers named Somagi Takumi and Arata. She's given a trial period of one week for the job.  \n  \n3.Michibiki no Tsue (The Staff of Guidance)  \nHotaru is training to be a \"staff\" - someone who guides spirits wandering between life and death. Her first case is Koizumi Otoha, a girl who loves piano, but cannot choose between staying and going from the world.  \n  \n4.Wish Upon the Stars  \nThe planetarium in Konno Momiji's town is closing, so it's offering free performances for a week. Momiji goes and meets one of her old middle school classmates, Hiiragi Kiwa, who is working part-time as a commentator at the planetarium. They start hanging out and Momiji becomes more interested in both the stars and Kiwa…  \n  \nFrench :   \n  \n1. Un tissu à pois  \nElle est peut-être grande, mais la lycéenne Fukagawa Yori aime les belles robes. Cependant, le garçon qu'elle aime lui dit: \"Ça ne te va pas\". Traumatisée par ces mots, elle fait tout pour participer à un défilé de mode.  \n  \n2. Histoire d'amour chez les Somagi  \nUmino Kujira répond à une annonce pour être femme de ménage dans la maison de deux frères nommés Somagi Takumi et Arata. Ainsi commence sa période d'essai d'une semaine pour ce travail …  \n  \n3. Une guide pas comme les autres  \nHotaru s'entraine pour être une guide spirituelle qui guidera les esprits errant entre la vie et la mort. Son premier cas est Koizumi Otoha, une fille qui aime le piano, mais qui ne peut choisir entre rester et partir du monde.  \n   \n  \n4. Rêver aux étoiles  \nLe planétarium de la ville de Konno Momiji va fermer, donc il offre des spectacles gratuits pendant une semaine. Momiji y va et rencontre un de ses anciens camarades de classe du collège, Hiiragi Kiwa, qui travaille à temps partiel comme commentateur au planétarium. To add insult to injury, for the longest time, he didn't even realize that she was a girl.\n\nTomo-chan wa Onnanoko! follows the comedic hijinks of Tomo and her friends as she tries to catch Jun's eye and escape the infamous brozone.\n\n---\n**Notes:**\n- This colored version is from the \"Coloring pages of Tomo-Chan until I finish, give up, or die\" posts on reddit /r/manga by /u/fukai20."},"links":{"al":"86300","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B077LBDLLF","ap":"tomo-chan-is-a-girl","bw":"series/132488","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1870842","engtl":"https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/tomo-chan-is-a-girl/","kt":"tomo-chan-wa-onnanoko","mal":"92149","mu":"120945","raw":"https://sai-zen-sen.jp/comics/twi4/tomochan/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"7b2ce280-79ef-4c09-9b58-12b7c23a9b78","name":{"en":"Fan Colored"}},{"id":"b11fda93-8f1d-4bef-b2ed-8803d3733170","name":{"en":"4-Koma"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

[ألا تريد أن تنتقم ممن خدعوك وقتلوك تمامًا؟] قررت أن أقبل العرض الحلو الشيطاني. هذه المرة ، سأحصل بالتأكيد على حجر الوصي وأصبح رب الأسرة. سأعيد لك ما عانته أو أكثر. حتى ذلك الحين ، لن يصدق أحد. لكن ... \"من الآن فصاعدًا ، بغض النظر عما يحدث ، يجب ألا تتوقف وتهرب أبدًا.\" صورته يحاول إنقاذني ، وعيناه تجريان في اليأس ، لا يمكن محوها من ذهني. الخطيب الذي أحببته كان ينظر إلي وأنا أحتضر ، لكن لماذا تركض نحوي بتلك العيون ، التي كنت تعتقد أنها شخص أختها ... أردت أن تعرف ما هو صدقك.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55886614)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2917), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59111743)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/helena-master-of-the-guardian-stone/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26313\u0026contentId=313)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E8%BC%A9%E5%AD%90%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E8%A6%81%E7%95%B6%E4%B8%BB%E4%BA%BA/305)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/734)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/In-This-Life-Im-the-Master/552)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/107783)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/349)","en":"The guardian stone of the family appeared to me. To me, the illegitimate child, not my half-sister who is my enemy. Since then, my treatment changed. It really felt like I was part of the family. However, as I died, I realized that it was all an illusion at the hands of my fiancé. That everything he did for me was a scheme by my half-sister to take the guardian stone.\n\n[Don't you want to take revenge on those who thoroughly deceived and killed you?]\n\nI decided to accept the devilishly sweet offer. This time, I will definitely get the guardian stone and become the head of the household. I will give you back as much or more than what I suffered. Until then, I will believe no one. But-\n\n“From now on, no matter what happens, you must never stop and run.”\n\nThe image of him trying to save me, his eyes running in despair, couldn't be erased from my mind. The fiancé I loved was looking at me as I died, but why were you running to me with those eyes. You, who I thought was my sister's person... I want to know where your sincerity lies.\n\n---\nHelena Croisen, bastard child of the family, thought she would finally be acknowledged when the power of the guardian stone manifested in her. Little did she know, a conspiracy was going on behind her back — one that would end with her beloved fiancé stabbing her in the heart. As Helena draws her final breath, a mysterious voice speaks to her. “Do you wish for vengeance?” Next thing she knows, she’s gone back two years in time! Will Helena be able to avoid the same tragic fate this time around?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55886614)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2917), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59111743)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/helena-master-of-the-guardian-stone/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26313\u0026contentId=313)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E8%BC%A9%E5%AD%90%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E8%A6%81%E7%95%B6%E4%B8%BB%E4%BA%BA/305)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/734)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/In-This-Life-Im-the-Master/552)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/107783)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/349)","fr":"La pierre gardienne de la famille m'est apparue. À moi, l'enfant illégitime, pas à ma demi-sœur qui est mon ennemi. Depuis, la façon dont on me traite a changé. J'avais vraiment l'impression de faire partie de la famille. Cependant, en mourant, j'ai réalisé que tout cela n'était qu'une illusion aux mains de mon fiancé. Que tout ce qu'il a fait pour moi n'était qu'un stratagème de ma demi-sœur pour prendre la pierre gardienne.\n\n«Ne veux-tu pas prendre ta revanche sur ceux qui t'ont trompé et tué?»\n\nJ'ai décidé d'accepter l'offre diaboliquement douce. Cette fois-ci, je vais définitivement obtenir la pierre gardienne et devenir le chef de famille. Je te rendrai autant ou plus que ce que j'ai souffert. Jusque-là, je ne croira personne. Mais-\n\n«À partir de maintenant, quoi qu'il arrive, tu ne dois jamais t'arrêter et fuir.»\n\nL'image de lui essayant de me sauver, ses yeux remplis de désespoir, ne pouvait pas être effacée de mon esprit. Le fiancé que j'aimais me regarder alors que je suis en train de mourir, mais pourquoi tu cours vers moi avec ces yeux. Toi, qui je pensais être avec ma sœur… Je veux savoir que la vérité.\n\n---\nHerna, fille illégitime du marquis de Croizen, a grandi cachée des regards au sein du manoir familial. Mais lorsque le pouvoir de la pierre gardienne se manifeste, et qu'elle devient de facto l'héritière du domaine, les plans de la famille changent: Herna doit disparaître. Trahie par ses proches et assassinée en pleine forêt, elle se voit alors offrir un choix: mourir, ou recommencer sa vie d'héritière et se venger. Mais une question subsiste: quel sera le prix de la vengeance pour Herna?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55886614)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** 84947b8a-71fa-47f7-bfd7-6ee0f45228e3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"84947b8a-71fa-47f7-bfd7-6ee0f45228e3","title":{"en":"Wild Half"},"altTitles":[{"en":"ワイルドハーフ"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"This is a shounen manga about a senior named Taketo Iwase and a dog named Salsa. As they set off early on to resolve a problem with a criminal that Toshifumi (Taketo's brother) is having, Taketo sees that there is more to the dog (that can communicate in the human language) than meets the eye. Together they solve a number of troubles and also meet other different species (cat girls, dogs, birds, etc). The author clearly shows that she is capable of drawing dynamic illustrations, especially in the fighting scenes although it make look somewhat shoujo at times. Murasaki giữ bí mật về khả năng nhìn thấy tương lai của mình và rất mong chờ nó, bởi vì cô thấy Shijima là nửa kia  định mệnh mà cô sẽ kết hôn."},"links":{"al":"130481","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09P7VMMY3","ap":"sensei-kongetsu-dou-desu-ka","bw":"series/303472","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/641790","kt":"63899","mal":"137410","mu":"175387","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_003880_S"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

851462a8-1afb-4462-9ab8-788eb6e21cae:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"851462a8-1afb-4462-9ab8-788eb6e21cae","title":{"en":"Phantom Detective"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"まぼろし探偵"},{"ja-ro":"Maboroshi Tantei"}],"lastChapter":"15","relatedIdds":["2211e3ed-1121-4410-857c-e410849925bb","2211e3ed-1121-4410-857c-e410849925bb"],"description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\n\nRespond to the call for help and avenge the evil! Heroes of an era, forever! \n\nMillionaire Mr. Moukada informs Inspector Fuji that he has been attacked by a murderer! However, the murderer is a murderer depicted in a painting, and he has escaped from the painting. Susumu, Inspector Fuji, and reporter Kurohoshi go to Mr. Moketa's place to keep an eye on the painting.......! What is the mystery of the murderer in the painting? \n\n\"Phantom Detective\" (originally titled \"Boy Detective King\"), serialized in \"Shonen Gaho\" from 1957, is known as one of Jiro Kuwata's best-known works. It was such a big hit that boys at the time were seen making their own black masks out of cardboard and playing with them, yearning to see the \"Phantom Detective\" in his red hat, black mask, and yellow scarf as he took on mysterious cases. It was also dramatized for television and broadcast on the radio for one year from 1959. \n\nIt is also famous that Sayuri Yoshinaga, who had just made her debut, appeared in it regularly. \n\nJiro Kuwata's stardom was propelled by the success of this work, and he became a successful writer with several serials in the same period, including \"Moonlight Mask,\" written by Yasunori Kawauchi, \"X-Man,\" \"Baby Tech,\" and \"Maboroshi Shiro. In other words, it can be said that this is the work that paved the way for the future of Jiro Kuwata, a genius young mangaka."},"links":{"ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/683052/","mu":"83766","raw":"https://www.mangaz.com/series/detail/117951"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

855fff13-93c8-4fc0-938c-7e7f2d50c9a9:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"855fff13-93c8-4fc0-938c-7e7f2d50c9a9","title":{"en":"The Husky and His White Cat Shizun"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"二哈和他的白猫师尊"},{"uk":"Хаскі і його вчитель білий кіт"},{"zh-ro":"Er Ha He Ta De Bai Mao Shi Zun"},{"en":"Dumb Husky and His White Cat Shizun"}],"lastChapter":"72","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","uk"],"description":{"en":"The emperor of the cultivation world, Mo Weiyu, had deceived elders and slaughtered ancestors, committing every crime and sin known to humanity. After taking his own life, he was reborn into the year where he first became a disciple. The body of youth contained the soul of an old man. After returning to life, truths that had been hidden beneath the surface during his previous life were unearthed one after another. Among those revelations, the one that left him most stunned was that the shizun who he had hated to the bone during his previous life had actually always been secretly protecting him from the shadows...The heart of one can change, and even ghosts and demons can repent, but his sins weigh heavy. Can he ever wash clean the blood on his hands?","uk":"Мо Жань відчував, що вибрати Чу Ваньніна на роль свого вчителя було величезною помилкою: аж надто різними вони здавалися. Якщо один усією своєю сутністю нагадував кота, то інший - скидався на дурного пса, який тільки і може, що виляти хвостом і пускати слину.\nМо Жань споконвіку був переконаний у тому, що собакам належить водитися лише з собаками. Наприклад, його старший брат-наставник, красивий і покірний, наче милий японський шпіц, міг би стати ідеальним партнером. Про такі союзи ще кажуть, що їх благословили самі небеса.\nУтім, після своєї смерті й відроження, після двох минулих життів, тим, кого він щоразу повертав до свого лігва, ставав саме нестерпний білосніжний Вчитель-кіт..."},"links":{"ap":"the-husky-and-his-white-cat-shizun","mu":"4x6gayf","raw":"https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11037/"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"acc803a4-c95a-4c22-86fc-eb6b582d82a2","name":{"en":"Wuxia"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
